content: प्रति(ती)कारः {@--1@} Requital, reward, return. {@--2@} Revenge, retaliation, retribution. {@--3@} Counter-action, obviating, prevention, remedy, application of a remedy; विकारं खंलु परमार्थतोऽज्ञात्वाऽनारंभः प्रतीकारस्य <ls>Ś. 3</ls>; प्रतीकारो व्याधेः सुखमिति विपर्यस्यति जनः <ls>Bh. 3. 92.</ls> {@--4@} Opposition, obstruction. {@--5@} Help. {@--6@} A kind of treaty where one party requites the services of the other.
